profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

Since 2010 Hawk Property Developments has been a prominent Design-Build Firm in the Greater Toronto Area. 

Our mission is simple: to set the standard in our industry with hard work, integrity, professionalism and an unwavering dedication to customer satisfaction. We believe that every project needs to be inspired by the people who experience it every day. That’s why our team is dedicated to drawing from your inspiration and bringing it to life.

Create your dream nest.

Contact us today to learn how we can partner with you on your next project!

profile:
Tiger Elite Design Construction was created by Mr. Woodhall; who is the 3rd generation in his family to be in the residential and commercial construction field, and being an owner operator of a construction business.

​

Mr. Woodhall learned from a very early age what it means to put his customers first and that paying attention to quality no matter the dollar size of the job is essential.

​

Mr. Woodhall first started out in the residential construction field as a flyer delivery boy for his granfather, and then his father. He learned then how to view each project individually when speaking with home owners. He then became a labourer for his family business, and moved to head labourer or supervisor so to speak at a very early age, where he would not only work on the job but have to pay attention to the details of the job being done and  look for new workers for the company.

​

Mr. Woodhall's grandfather and Father made sure that he knew each task from installing decks and fences to roofing, siding, window trim repair, painting and roof framing. When his family had closed down there family business in his early years, Mr. Woodhall then moved on to learn commercial construction in the KW tri-city region and GTA regions, where he learned how to excavate, landscape, and pour concrete.

​

Mr. Woodhall has seen prices sky rocket over the years since he was a young child and he created our company to try and bring top quality to his customers while trying to be able to give reasonable prices.

​

Mr. Woodhall believes that one should not have to sacrifice quality for price, and understand that there is a difference so while using only quality material, Mr. Woodhall will do his best to give a reasonable price for each job.

​

Mr. Woodhall believes in treating each customer and project with true dedication and strives to make sure each customer is satisfied with their project.

​

CONTACT US TODAY FOR YOUR FREE ESTIMATE AND CONSULTATION!!!
name: Tiger Elite Design Construction

profile:
We provide seamless architecture and interior design services to homeowners, contractors, and developers.  We do projects starting at $150,000 and up.  We do new homes,additions and restoration projects; traditional, contemporary and modern designs. We know excellent contractors and suppliers for any project. We believe all projects deserve the same attention to detail and quality-no matter the budget or location.  We work mostly in the Toronto area, but increasingly accross the province and beyond.

We are good listeners, and add value through our award winning experience (since 1977)and our expertise.  Vist our website or call us for a no cost meeting or first site visit.

What distinguishes an award winning architect in today’s crowded design marketplace? To ensure client satisfaction, the architect must be a good listener! 

The successful architect must possess senses of vision, proportion, and design, as well as have the skill and experience to capture the clients’ ideas and take them beyond their wildest dreams. Only through the combination of a thorough understanding the of the client’s goals, and achieving high design standards within the real world context of fiscal constraint, complex approvals, and existing urban and/or building fabrics, can an architect maximize the value of a project through his or her involvement.

At Gabor Associates: Architecture, Urban Design, and Interiors, the principal, Peter A. Gabor, Architect MRAIC and his longstanding professional support staff are dedicated to understanding the client’s needs, and fulfilling the functional design within a framework of design excellence in, style, finish, and contextual response. To us, a project is not truly satisfying unless the client is as proud of the design as we are.
services: Custom Home Interiors/Residential Multiple and Mixed Use/Commercial and Institutional/Feasibility Studies/International Projects
specialities: Combining archetecture and interior design into a seamless design service.
diplomas: Governer Generals Award, McGill University BSC Arch and B Arch
memberships: BUILD, Board of Trade and Sharebourne Health Centre
name: Peter A Gabor, Architect
